DefaultReaderConfiguration.fullDescription: Barracuda Spam and Virus Firewall manages all inbound and outbound email traffic

file.toolTipText: Directory or path to read from

string.toolTipText: Hostname of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

integer.toolTipText: Port number of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

select.toolTipText: Data routing (normalized alerts to Manager and/or raw data to nDepth)

integer.toolTipText: Number of seconds between log reads

FastFormatter.format: Barracuda per-user quarantined email from "$8" to "$9"
ID: $6, Reason: "Too Many Message In Session", Extra: "$12"
ID: $6, Reason: "Need Fully Qualified Recipient", Extra: "$12"
ID: $6, Reason: "Need Fully Qualified Sender", Extra: "$12"
ID: $6, Reason: "MAIL FROM Syntax Error", Extra: "$12"
ID: $6, Reason: "RCPT TO Syntax Error", Extra: "$12"
ID: $6, Reason: "Allowed Message Size Exceeded", Extra: "$12"
Barracuda scanned and allowed email to "$10"
Barracuda scanned and allowed email from "$9"
Barracuda scanned and allowed email from "$9" to "$10"
Barracuda scanned and aborted email to "$10"
Barracuda scanned and aborted email from "$9"
Barracuda scanned and aborted email from "$9" to "$10"
Barracuda scanned and blocked email to "$10"
Barracuda scanned and blocked email from "$9"
Barracuda scanned and blocked email from "$9" to "$10"
Barracuda scanned and quarantined email to "$10"
Barracuda scanned and quarantined email from "$9"
Barracuda scanned and quarantined email from "$9" to "$10"
Barracuda scanned and tagged email to "$10"
Barracuda scanned and tagged email from "$9"
Barracuda scanned and tagged email from "$9" to "$10"
Barracuda scanned and deferred email to "$10"
Barracuda scanned and deferred email from "$9"
Barracuda scanned and deferred email from "$9" to "$10"
Barracuda scanned and per-user quarantined email
Barracuda scanned and per-user quarantined email to "$10"
Barracuda scanned and per-user quarantined email from "$9"
Barracuda scanned and per-user quarantined email from "$9" to "$10"
Barracuda scanned and whitelisted email to "$10"
Barracuda scanned and whitelisted email from "$9"
Barracuda scanned and whitelisted email from "$9" to "$10"
ID: $6, Reason: "Banned Attachment", Encrypted: $8, Score: $11, Extra: "$14"
ID: $6, Reason: "RBL Match", Encrypted: $8, Score: $11, Extra: "$14"
ID: $6, Reason: "Rate Control", Encrypted: $8, Score: $11, Extra: "$14"
ID: $6, Reason: "Too Many Message In Session", Encrypted: $8, Score: $11, Extra: "$14"
ID: $6, Reason: "Timeout Exceeded", Encrypted: $8, Score: $11, Extra: "$14"
ID: $6, Reason: "No Such Domain", Encrypted: $8, Score: $11, Extra: "$14"
ID: $6, Reason: "No Such User", Encrypted: $8, Score: $11, Extra: "$14"
ID: $6, Reason: "Subject Filter Match", Encrypted: $8, Score: $11, Extra: "$14"
ID: $6, Reason: "Client IP", Encrypted: $8, Score: $11, Extra: "$14"
ID: $6, Reason: "Recipient Address Rejected", Encrypted: $8, Score: $11, Extra: "$14"
ID: $6, Reason: "No Valid Recipients", Encrypted: $8, Score: $11, Extra: "$14"
ID: $6, Reason: "Domain Not Found", Encrypted: $8, Score: $11, Extra: "$14"
ID: $6, Reason: "Sender Address Rejected", Encrypted: $8, Score: $11, Extra: "$14"
ID: $6, Reason: "Need Fully Qualified Recipient", Encrypted: $8, Score: $11, Extra: "$14"
ID: $6, Reason: "Need Fully Qualified Sender", Encrypted: $8, Score: $11, Extra: "$14"
ID: $6, Reason: "Unsupported Command", Encrypted: $8, Score: $11, Extra: "$14"
ID: $6, Reason: "MAIL FROM Syntax Error", Encrypted: $8, Score: $11, Extra: "$14"
ID: $6, Reason: "Bad Address Syntax", Encrypted: $8, Score: $11, Extra: "$14"
ID: $6, Reason: "RCPT TO Syntax Error", Encrypted: $8, Score: $11, Extra: "$14"
ID: $6, Reason: "Send EHLO/HELO First", Encrypted: $8, Score: $11, Extra: "$14"
ID: $6, Reason: "Need MAIL Command", Encrypted: $8, Score: $11, Extra: "$14"
ID: $6, Reason: "Nested MAIL Command", Encrypted: $8, Score: $11, Extra: "$14"
ID: $6, Reason: "EHLO/HELO Syntax Error", Encrypted: $8, Score: $11, Extra: "$14"
ID: $6, Reason: "Mail Protocol Error", Encrypted: $8, Score: $11, Extra: "$14"
ID: $6, Reason: "Header Filter Match", Encrypted: $8, Score: $11, Extra: "$14"
ID: $6, Reason: "Sender Block/Accept", Encrypted: $8, Score: $11, Extra: "$14"
ID: $6, Reason: "Recipient Block/Accept", Encrypted: $8, Score: $11, Extra: "$14"
ID: $6, Reason: "Body Filter Match", Encrypted: $8, Score: $11, Extra: "$14"
ID: $6, Reason: "Message Size Bypass", Encrypted: $8, Score: $11, Extra: "$14"
ID: $6, Reason: "Intention Analysis Match", Encrypted: $8, Score: $11, Extra: "$14"
ID: $6, Reason: "Client Host Rejected", Encrypted: $8, Score: $11, Extra: "$14"
ID: $6, Reason: "Authentication Not Enabled", Encrypted: $8, Score: $11, Extra: "$14"
ID: $6, Reason: "Allowed Message Size Exceeded", Encrypted: $8, Score: $11, Extra: "$14"
ID: $6, Reason: "Too Many Recipients", Encrypted: $8, Score: $11, Extra: "$14"
ID: $6, Reason: "Need RCPT Command", Encrypted: $8, Score: $11, Extra: "$14"
ID: $6, Reason: "DATA Syntax Error", Encrypted: $8, Score: $11, Extra: "$14"
ID: $6, Reason: "Internal Error", Encrypted: $8, Score: $11, Extra: "$14"
ID: $6, Reason: "Too Many Hops", Encrypted: $8, Score: $11, Extra: "$14"
ID: $6, Reason: "Invalid Parameter Syntax", Encrypted: $8, Score: $11, Extra: "$14"
ID: $6, Reason: "STARTTLS Syntax Error", Encrypted: $8, Score: $11, Extra: "$14"
ID: $6, Reason: "TLS Already Active", Encrypted: $8, Score: $11, Extra: "$14"
ID: $6, Reason: "Too Many Errors", Encrypted: $8, Score: $11, Extra: "$14"
ID: $6, Reason: "Need STARTTLS First", Encrypted: $8, Score: $11, Extra: "$14"
ID: $6, Reason: "Spam Fingerprint Found", Encrypted: $8, Score: $11, Extra: "$14"
ID: $6, Reason: "Barracuda Whitelist", Encrypted: $8, Score: $11, Extra: "$14"
ID: $6, Reason: "Barracuda Blocklist", Encrypted: $8, Score: $11, Extra: "$14"
